
# GlobalCloudPay 
![globalcloudpay](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/globalcloudpay/logo.svg?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `globalcloudpay` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] GlobalCloudPay 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  GloblCloudPay is an international online payment services provider, specializing in e-commerce solutions for HIGH RISK merchants around the world. With decade experience in payment industry and extensive worldwide acquiring banks network.
